com.samskivert.net
Class MailUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.samskivert.net.MailUtil

public class MailUtil
extends Object

The mail util class encapsulates some utility functions related to sending emails.

Constructor Detail

MailUtil

public MailUtil()
Method Detail

isValidAddress

public static boolean isValidAddress(String address)
Checks the supplied address against a regular expression that (for the most part) matches only valid email addresses. It's not perfect, but the omissions and inclusions are so obscure that we can't be bothered to worry about them.

normalizeAddress

public static String normalizeAddress(String address)
Returns:
a normalized form of the specified email address (everything after the @ sign is lowercased).

deliverMail

public static void deliverMail(String recipient,
                               String sender,
                               String subject,
                               String body)
                        throws IOException
Delivers the supplied mail message using the machine's local mail SMTP server which must be listening on port 25.

Throws:
IOException - thrown if an error occurs delivering the email. See Transport.send(javax.mail.Message) for exceptions that can be thrown due to response from the SMTP server.

deliverMail

public static void deliverMail(String[] recipients,
                               String sender,
                               String subject,
                               String body)
                        throws IOException
Delivers the supplied mail message using the machine's local mail SMTP server which must be listening on port 25. If the mail.smtp.host system property is set, that will be used instead of localhost.

Throws:
IOException - thrown if an error occurs delivering the email. See Transport.send(javax.mail.Message) for exceptions that can be thrown due to response from the SMTP server.

deliverMail

public static void deliverMail(String[] recipients,
                               String sender,
                               String subject,
                               String body,
                               String[] headers,
                               String[] values)
                        throws IOException
Delivers the supplied mail, with the specified additional headers.

Throws:
IOException

deliverMail

public static void deliverMail(String[] recipients,
                               String sender,
                               String subject,
                               MimeMessage message)
                        throws IOException
Delivers an already-formed message to the specified recipients. This message can be any mime type including multipart.

Throws:
IOException

createEmptyMessage

public static final MimeMessage createEmptyMessage()
Returns an initialized, but empty message.
